title: Fragment, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: wool, linen
Technique: stamped on plain weave velvet with supplementary warps/ cut loops
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (selvage to selvage): 77.5 x 61 cm (30 1/2 in. x 24 in.)
Repeat H: 68.5 cm (26 15/16 in.)
description: Slightly more than one repeat of a flower on a long curved stem with leaves within a symmetrical frame in the style of the 1st half of the 18th century. The pattern stamped in the strong yellow wool pile which is very stuff and long. (Pattern can be seen clearly on the back.)

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, early 20th century. Medium: wool, linen
Technique: stamped on plain weave velvet with supplementary warps/ cut loops. 1974-71-1.
